name: Target Toxin
desc:
You enchant a weapon or piece of ammunition with a poison that tracks its victim. The next time the poisoned weapon damages a creature, it establishes a mental connection to you. You always know where the creature is for the remaining duration of the spell.

Every 10 minutes, the creature must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, they take 1d8 poison damage, and their highest stat drops by 1 for the duration of the spell. In the case of a tie, the creature chooses which stat is decreased.
empower: Every 10 minutes, the creature's two highest stats drop by 1 on a failed saving throw instead.
author: CrusaderDroid
